name: Take A Hike With Your Children
categories: Take A Hike With Your Children
description: A hiking book for families with young children that features 46 hikes of 5km or less in the Canadian Rockies region. These hikes are located in Banff, Canmore, Kananaskis and Lake Louise. Icons are used to indicate the level of difficulty for each hike, if the hike is stroller friendly and more. There's also a Plan B – such as a park or interpretive centre – for each area as well.
